experience.description: Responsible for the CoinGecko mobile application using React Native. Currently focused on revamping the app and optimizing performance and improving the user experience.

Part of the team that built the merchant web views for Fave using React with functional components and hooks for better performance. Implemented visualization of merchant data with Chart.js. Helped set up CleverTap to track user events.

Revamped the RinggitPlus website to a modern, scalable and mobile-first website with speed and performance in mind using Marko.js and Algolia. Adopted the latest additions to CSS3 such as CSS grid and custom CSS properties. Optimized SEO with semantic HTML and JSON-LD.

Responsible for creating website and landing page mockups, and digital marketing banners. Delved into web development by bringing those mockups to life with code with HTML and CSS by building Wordpress websites, landing pages and Alibaba sites.
As the sole designer, worked independently to produce event visuals, promotional advertising materials and branding solutions in both digital and print mediums.
